title: Follow the Bitch (1996) DVDRip x264 with EXTRAS
description:
Full DVD rip with extras (you can find it on Amazon):

- three separate audio tracks (movie, movie + commentary from the writer/director and producers, movie + commentary from the cast)
- Anatomy of a Scene (00:05:31), Anatomy of a Shot (00:05:37)
- interviews with the cast members (total of 00:39:53)
- trailer (00:02:51)

The movie file has only one audio track.  You can hook up the included commentary tracks in your media player (e.g., VLC - search for how to "play external audio track with video").

No subtitles were included on DVD, feel free to make and share one. :)

Plot Summary:

A group of single guys meet for their weekly, all male, all-night poker game. One of the regulars invites a woman (Liz) to join and she turns out to be a very good player. Things get more complicated when two of the guys (Ty and Gordon) confide to a third (Andy) that they're having affairs with each other's girlfriends. The host (Bill) tries to keep his weekly ritual intact as it begins to crumble around him
